title: [Self-Directed] Data-Driven Persuasive Support System for Learning Habit Formation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and understanding of core social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Environment providing visual feedback via a PSD model-based LA dashboard by tracking habit patterns through learning log analysis. Learners perform repetitive training in VR simulations resembling real learning contexts

learning_goals: Learners can identify their habit types (regular/irregular) with 80% accuracy through learning log data analysis after six months.
Learners can improve weekly learning plan adherence by 40% or more using persuasive elements (goal tracking, comparison features, etc.) of the LA dashboard.
Learners can recognize three or more inefficient habit patterns and develop correction plans through feedback based on the PSD model.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
